page.shortlink: ux list builder list properties Custom scroll indicator settings
page.description: You can customize the position and appearance of the scroll indicator that is shown when the List is scrolled.

description.p: When you are drag scrolling on a List (or any container that supports drag scrolling), scroll indicators are displayed.

You can customize the appearance of these scroll indicators (or even turn them off). To customize the scroll indicator settings, click the smart field for the 'Custom scroll indicator settings' property.

section.note: The scroller is supported for all styles, not just iOS7, AndroidDark or AndroidLight.
